trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_SEQ_00<tab>The nonplussed noblewoman is looking up into the parapets with a panicked expression.

TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_SEQ_01<tab>A noblewoman's beloved pet has gotten itself into quite a pickle. She has found her way up onto the roof and cannot get down. Help the poor thing get back down to the ground.
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_SEQ_02<tab>You rescue the kitten. It is suspiciously coeurl-like, but take it back to the noblewoman anyway─she promised a reward!

TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_SEQ_03<tab>The woman is overjoyed to have her pet back safe and sound. You try to inform her that it seems more like a coeurl pup than a cat, but she is thoroughly convinced that it is an adorable kitten. All you can do now is to pray for her safety.
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pet to the noblewoman.
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>The suspiciously coeurl-like kitten peers over the ledge apprehensively.
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_000_000<tab>Oh, my baby! My poor, poor baby! How did you get up there!?
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_000_001<tab><sob> Oh, whatever shall I do? It's so high up... Please, somebody do something!
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_000_002<tab>You'll help me, won't you!? Please! I promise you'll be repaid! Please save my poor kitty!
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The suspiciously coeurl-like kitten pounces into your arms.
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_100_030<tab>Do you have her? Do you have my dear, dear kitty?
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_000_030<tab>There you are, you silly little thing. You had me so <var 1A 02 /var>worried<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_000_031<tab>...What? You think my dear little kitty isn't really a cat? She's really a coeurl!?
TEXT_HEAVNZ105_01754_LADY01754_000_032<tab>Hahahaha! To think I almost believed you for a second there! My dear little kitty isn't some man-eating monster. Just look at her! Look how cute she is!
